titles.title: Via Bethlehem We Journey (familiar tune easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Via Bethlehem we journey We whose hearts on God are set Babe-like souls of Jesus learning While our cheeks with tears are wet For the manger and the stable Are not pleasant to our eyes But our feet must follow Jesus If our hands would grasp the prize{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Via Nazareth the pathway Narrows still as on we go Years of toil none understanding Yet God teaches us to know That the servant is not greater Than the lord, who thro' long years Hid Himself from this world's glory Follow Him. Count not the tears{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Via Galilee, we see Him Stones are hurled and curses hissed By the men who gather round Him Has He not the pathway missed No - unharmed the Savior passes And this rough bit of the way We must travel since like Jesus Nothing can our purpose stay{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Via too the awful anguish Of the hours beneath the trees Where the hosts of Satan linger Awful hours of anguish these Yet we fail not for God's angels Minister to us and say "Look, beloved at the glory Conflict is but for a day!"{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then the Cross for via Calvary Every royal soul must go Here we draw the veil For Jesus only can the pathway show "If we suffer with Him" Listen Just a little, little while And the memory will have faded In the glory of His smile{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then the grave with dear ones weeping Knowing that all life has fled (Fellow-pilgrims art thou numbered With the men the world calls dead?) Thence we rise and live with Jesus Throned above the world's mad strife Gladly forfeiting forever All that worldlings count as life{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}On we press and yonder gleaming Nearing every day we see The great walls of that fair city God has built for such as we And we catch the tender music Of the choirs that sing of One Who once died to have us with Him In His kingdom on the throne{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Just a few more miles beloved And our feet shall ache no more No more sin, and no more sorrow Hush thee Jesus went before And I hear Him sweetly whispering Faint not fear not still press on For it may be ere tomorrow The long Journey will be done{/lang-eng}
